IP.Name: USBPD
IP.About: USBPD : Universal Serial Bus Power Delivery

RefParameter.Name: USBPD_DEVICE_APP_MEM_POOL_SIZE
RefParameter.Description: Default memory pool size for the USBPD application.

RefParameter.Name: USBPD_DMA_Request
RefParameter.DefaultValue: No UCPD1_RX and UCPD1_TX DMA Channel

Condition.Diagnostic: No UCPD1_RX and UCPD1_TX DMA Channel
Both instances of UCPD must be active

RefParameter.Name: USBPD_VID

Condition.Diagnostic: USBPD works with USBX and use the USBX VID

RefParameter.Description: The Vendor ID is defined by the USBD_VID parameter of USBX peripheral.

RefParameter.Name: USBPD_VID
RefParameter.Description:
The Vendor ID is assigned by the USB Implementers Forum.
The Vendor ID for STMicroelectronics is 0x0483.

RefParameter.Name: USBPD_PID

Condition.Diagnostic: USBPD works with USBX and use the USBX PID

RefParameter.Description: The Product ID is defined by the USBD_PID parameter of USBX peripheral.

RefParameter.Name: USBPD_PID
RefParameter.Description: The Product ID is assigned by the USB Implementers Forum.

RefParameter.Name: USBPD_XID
RefParameter.Description: Outward facing identifier used to determine certification status of a PD product.

RefParameter.Name: GUI_V1_8_0_OR_NEWER
RefParameter.Description: GUI Version embedded in FW package.

RefParameter.Name: PE_SupportedSOP_P0
RefParameter.Description: SOP is supported by default

RefParameter.Name: PE_SupportedSOPapos_P0
RefParameter.Description: SOP' is not supported by default

RefParameter.Name: PE_SupportedSOPquot_P0
RefParameter.Description: SOP" is not supported by default

RefParameter.Name: PE_SupportedSOPaposDBG_P0
RefParameter.Description: SOP' debug is not supported by default

RefParameter.Name: PE_SupportedSOPquotDBG_P0
RefParameter.Description: SOP" debug is not supported by default

RefParameter.Name: PE_DefaultRole_P0
RefParameter.Description:
When the UCPD instance is initialized to sink then the port role will always be sink.
When the UCPD instance is initialized to source then the port role will always be source.
When the UCPD instance is initialized to dual role then the port role can either be source or sink. By default it will be initialized to sink.

RefParameter.Name: PE_DefaultRole_P0
RefParameter.Description:
When the UCPD instance is initialized to sink then the port role will always be sink.
When the UCPD instance is initialized to source then the port role will always be source.
When the UCPD instance is initialized to dual role then the port role can either be source or sink. By default it will be initialized to sink.

RefParameter.Name: PE_DefaultRole_P0
RefParameter.Description:
When the UCPD instance is initialized to sink then the port role will always be sink.
When the UCPD instance is initialized to source then the port role will always be source.
When the UCPD instance is initialized to dual role then the port role can either be source or sink. By default it will be initialized to sink.

RefParameter.Name: PE_RoleSwap_P0

PossibleValue.Diagnostic: The UCPD instance has been configured as dual role

RefParameter.Description: "Port role swap" is not supported by "Min Source" and "Min Sink" mode.

PossibleValue.Diagnostic: The UCPD instance has been configured as dual role
The UCPD instance has not been configured as dual role

RefParameter.Name: PE_DR_Swap_To_DFP_P0
RefParameter.Description: "Data role swap to DFP" is not supported by "Min Source" and "Min Sink" mode.

RefParameter.Name: PE_DR_Swap_To_UFP_P0
RefParameter.Description: "Data role swap to UFP" is not supported by "Min Source" and "Min Sink" mode.

RefParameter.Name: PE_VconnSwap_P0
RefParameter.Description: "VCONN swap" is not supported by "Min Sink" mode.

RefParameter.Name: PE_VDMSupport_P0
RefParameter.Description: "Vendor defined messages" is not supported by "CONFIG1", "Min Source", "Min Sink" and "Min Drp" mode.

RefParameter.Name: PE_RespondsToDiscovSOP_P0
RefParameter.Description: "Discover Identity response" is not supported by "Min Sink" mode.

Condition.Diagnostic: Only available if the UCPD instance has been configured as source or dual role

RefParameter.Name: PE_UnchunkSupport_P0
RefParameter.Description: "Unchunk mode" is not supported by "Min Source", "Min Sink" and "Min Drp" mode.

Condition.Diagnostic: Only available if the specification revision value is set to 3

RefParameter.Name: PE_FastRoleSwapSupportDisplayed_P0
RefParameter.Description: "Fast role swap" is not supported by "Min Source", "Min Sink" and "Min Drp" mode.

Condition.Diagnostic: Only available if the specification revision value is set to 3

RefParameter.Name: Is_GetPPSStatus_Supported_P0
RefParameter.Description: "PPS message" is not supported by "Min Sink", "Min Source" and "Min Drp" mode.

Condition.Diagnostic: Only available if the specification revision value is set to 3

RefParameter.Name: Is_SrcCapaExt_Supported_P0
RefParameter.Description: "Source Capabilities Extended message" is not supported by "Min Sink", "Min Source" and "Min Drp" mode.

Condition.Diagnostic: Only available if the specification revision value is set to 3

RefParameter.Name: Is_Alert_Supported_P0
RefParameter.Description: "Alert message" is not supported by "Min Sink", "Min Source" and "Min Drp" mode.

RefParameter.Name: Is_GetStatus_Supported_P0

RefParameter.Name: Is_GetManufacturerInfo_Supported_P0

RefParameter.Name: Is_GetCountryCodes_Supported_P0

RefParameter.Description: 3A max, 5A only for 20V PDO

RefParameter.Name: USBPD_PDO_FIXED_SET_OP_CURRENT
RefParameter.Description:
Max 3A for all voltages, except 20V: max 5A (requires 5A cable).
For EPR: Same but 5A 20V requires EPR cable. + 5A 28V/36V/48V possible also with EPR cable

RefParameter.Name: USBPD_PDO_FIXED_SET_VOLTAGE
RefParameter.Description: Only possible 5V, 9V, 15V, 20V
